page.title: 01GENERAL GUIDE TO BITTESWELL.
page.content: Our twelve squares are mainly fields,and it is only in the middle of them that there is some housing and warehouses. There are quite a few farms within the block. The M.1. motorway runs North/South through our block. There are a few spinneys but no real woods in our block. There is one complete village,Bitteswell,and a part of the market town of Lutterworth. Bitteswell is small,with many old houses,two pubs,a post office,and a church.It has a school dating from the 1840s. At its centre is a large green with an enormous copper beech tree. Modern housing estates join it with Lutterworth.
